components/Float.vue.description: Display a floating border around an element
components/Float.vue.name: Float
components/Float.vue.note: This component should be wrapped with <ClientOnly />

components/FocusMark.vue.description: Dim the page except for target element
components/FocusMark.vue.name: FocusMark
components/FocusMark.vue.note: This component should be wrapped with <ClientOnly />

components/Form.vue.description: Form component with automatic submit prevention
components/Form.vue.name: Form

components/Frame.vue.description: Use in mockups to create a frame with a set size

example.content:
<template>
  <Frame height="160px" width="100px">
    <Frame
      color="primary"
      dashed
      height="100%"
      width="100%"
    />
    <Frame dotted height="100%" width="100%" />
  </Frame>
</template>

components/Frame.vue.name: Frame

property.description: Style the frame border as dashed
property.name: dashed

property.description: Set the frame to desktop size
property.name: desktop

property.description: Style the frame border as dotted
property.name: dotted

property.description: Set the frame to phone size
property.name: phone

property.description: Set the frame to tablet size
property.name: tablet

components/Gradient/Background.vue.description: Apply a gradient background to child elements
components/Gradient/Background.vue.name: GradientBackground

components/Gradient/Text.vue.description: Apply a gradient text color to child elements
components/Gradient/Text.vue.name: GradientText

components/Highlight.vue.description: Draw the user's attention to a piece of text

example.content:
<template>
  <Highlight
    icon-color="orange"
    icon-name="warning"
    icon-variant="bold"
    warning
  >
    This is a warning
  </Highlight>
</template>

<template>
  <Highlight :auto-wrap="false" info>
    <Text>
      <Text bold part>
        Bold
      </Text>
      <Text italic part>
        italic
      </Text>
    </Text>
  </Highlight>
</template>

components/Highlight.vue.name: Highlight

property.description: Whether the link is active when non-exact

property.description: Maximum number of buttons to show
property.name: maxButtons

components/Content/AutoLinkA.vue.name: ContentAutoLinkA

property.description: Whether the link is active when non-exact
property.name: nonExact

example.content:
<template>
  <Slider v-model="rn1" :max="20" :min="10" />
</template>

<script lang="ts" setup>
  import { ref } from '#imports'


  const rn1 = ref<number>(0)
</script>

example.content:
<template>
  <Toggle v-model="rb1" />
  <Text>Toggle value: {{ rb1 }}</Text>
</template>

<script lang="ts" setup>
  import { ref } from '#imports'


  const rb1 = ref<boolean>(false)
</script>
